website_summaries.verdict: An elegantly designed armoire that has plenty of storage space hidden behind the beautiful slatted doors.
pros: The classic salt oak finish is highly attractive
Made from solid MDF and easy to assemble
Offers a simple, practical setup with hanging rail, two compartments, and two extension drawers
cons: A small number of users report inconsistent gluing of front drawer

customer_reviews.title: Looks okay But not the greatest quality
customer_reviews.text: I didn't expect a high quality piece of furniture, however, this cabinet, even though it was double boxed, had a corner broken off the top piece and some nicks on it. We did not have time to bother trying to get a replacement because it was for our 96 year old mother to put in her room in Assisted Living Facility. She has no patience waiting for anything so my Husband repaired it as best he could and it is now in her room.
customer_reviews.author: LadyDi56

customer_reviews.title: Not bad, but as others have noted
customer_reviews.text: Not bad, but as others have noted, it's a long, arduous process to put this together (about five hours total with two people). The biggest deficit, however, is that there are chunks missing all over the place, some pretty substantial and in noticeable places (see three photos). I would pay $210 if it wasn't damaged, but $310 is pretty absurd either way.
customer_reviews.author: JayEm

customer_reviews.title: Easy peasy
customer_reviews.text: Wish is mad made from a higher quality wood, but it’s beautiful. Gift for my wife & she loves it. Put this together by myself after 2 hours of sleep & then working overnight. Took me 2 hours. Make sure to read all directions before bringing assembly.
customer_reviews.author: Ward Family

customer_reviews.title: dimensions are wrong
customer_reviews.text: The dimensions are wrong!!!!! the width is only 36" and height is only 69"!!!! thats 3" shorter than claimed and almost 4" narrower!!!
customer_reviews.author: Bogdan111

customer_reviews.title: Very attractive, needed a lot of adjustments to set square
customer_reviews.text: We bought 2 of them because they had the correct dimensions and style to fit or needs. Assembly was not necessarily difficult but there are a lot of parts and it took a long time to accomplish. Once they were finished, the doors were skewed. It took some tweaking to get them to set square. They are easily knocked out of square. For the price, I would recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Mark S Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Good size and appearance
customer_reviews.text: Quality is fine, it just arrived with a little damage in one of the side walls, It took several hours to complete the assembly but hopefully it will work and last. It looks nice even though it is laminated finish. The materials were what we expected for the price and size. In our 1910 house with narrow staircase is impossible to carry up an assembled piece of furniture and less of this size.
customer_reviews.author: apineda

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy frame /Cheap back board
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful cabinet . Easy enough to assemble ( you need 2 sets of hands ) My ONLY disappointment is that the BACKING on this product is weak and flimsy . The body of the cabinet is sturdy, solid and formidable. Also there is NO option to add another shelf inside the cabinet . Either it’s a wardrobe and you have to use the clothing bar or it’s a tv case. But you don’t have a shelf to raise the tv or separate linens etc.
customer_reviews.author: Elle

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful cabinet
customer_reviews.text: The original order we received arrived with a piece broken. The seller promptly shipped a new one to us and made arrangements to pick up the broken one. The cabinet has held up very well with daily use and looks beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: sparren4

customer_reviews.title: Quality as expected
customer_reviews.text: Looks exactly as pictured. It's very nice and spacious inside. It took my fiance a while to put it together and he's done these things many many times. The quality is not wonderful, but definitely, lines up and holds my clothes well. It just isn't comparable to solid wood, but good for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Cioffi Bonfiglio

customer_reviews.title: Save your money!
customer_reviews.text: Lots of assembly required so you can really see what your getting. Overall I am less than impressed. I expected more for my money. The backing is junk and I had too many screws that were not needed and not enough of the ones I did need. It's all particle board.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Felter

customer_reviews.title: Very nice, good deal, worth 2-3x as much
customer_reviews.text: I put this together myself, spent an hour or two over a few days. Looks really nice! Solid. Recommended. I thought instructions were great as long as you go slow and really look at the pictures.
customer_reviews.author: TJ Grand

customer_reviews.title: A little difficult to put together. But, biggest ...
customer_reviews.text: A little difficult to put together. But, biggest downside is that I wanted to paint it... and discovered the latex paint would not "hold" --- beware... this has an oil finish.
customer_reviews.author: snowblaze

customer_reviews.title: Great Value & Look For Price
customer_reviews.text: We love this armoire! It has the right amount of elegance while still looking casual and providing a tropical feel. The back is very flimsy and I would not overload this unit. It was def great value for the price though. We used them in our King Rooms at Turtle Beach Sanctuary in Utila, Bay Islands. As we build more units we will continue to order these!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Like a lot of other reviewers wrote
customer_reviews.text: Like a lot of other reviewers wrote, this was very difficult to assemble. I would recommend putting it together in an area with a lot of space so you can spread out and access everything. While it took me about two hours to complete on my own, it was absolutely worth the effort. It looks great in our spare room and works wonderfully as a secondary closet for my summer clothes.
customer_reviews.author: V.T.

customer_reviews.title: Quality and good value at great price!!!
customer_reviews.text: Terrific piece, especially for the price. Had seen this piece on other furniture websites, but much more expensive! Put in our Florida house bedroom with the matching TV stand (we have a bed that matches well...for a beachy look). Very substantial, and better quality than expected. We have put together many various furniture pieces, and this went very smoothly....just follow directions and take your time! Would highly recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Terrible product
customer_reviews.text: Bought it because I liked the look. Piece of garbage. Unstable and the bottom piece kept popping out making it tilt forward. Too much hassle to disassemble and return it so keeping it.
customer_reviews.author: Lani T.

customer_reviews.title: This was exactly what I was looking for, and ...
customer_reviews.text: This was exactly what I was looking for, and it was cheaper than the other websites I found it on. It wasn't too difficult to put together, but you need a lot of space and some strong people to lift it wherever you want it to go. For the price I believe I got exactly what I paid. The hanging bar is more spacious than I thought and there's two slots on the bottom of the open area to add a few items. The drawers are quite roomy too as long as you don't put bulky items in there. It fits perfectly in my little room and I suspect it'll last a decent amount of time.
customer_reviews.author: KittyCat

customer_reviews.title: but it is a lot more particle board like than I expected because I had already purchased the ...
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for really. So, I should not be surprised, but it is a lot more particle board like than I expected because I had already purchased the end tables and they seemed a better value. It's fine. One of the handles was broke on the bottom but we will fix.
customer_reviews.author: Lenore D

customer_reviews.title: but found it easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: for the price and having to put it together, I was worried, naturally on the product.. but found it easy to put together, and a very sturdy solid piece of furniture !! I detest closets, and had mine ripped out, so needed somewhere I could place my clothes , and a few odds and ends ... I found the spacing under the clothes rack spacious, and the drawers under very solid and capable of holding a lot ! I would buy this again and again , for all my bedrooms.. =)
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: Considering the type of material it truly appears nice with the hardwood (metal) used and no issues with ...
customer_reviews.text: Would give a five star, but the material is not real wood. Considering the type of material it truly appears nice with the hardwood (metal) used and no issues with the drawers and openings. The fake wood looks more real as you have greater distance from it, but upon a close-up you can see it is fake. The price is right for what you get (material wise) and was easily assembled. Quite heavy, but useful for storage needs.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Turner

customer_reviews.title: Defective Drawer
customer_reviews.text: I like this item but one of the drawers is defective! Would it be possible to send me a new drawer for this Cherry Saunder Armoire!! Eric Rollins. 6 Oak Meadow lane, Thomasville, NC 27360
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great armoire
customer_reviews.text: Love this-sturdy, stylish, beautiful. Took about 2 hours to put together. Not difficult, everything lined up well- just takes some time. Armoire is more yellow/cream than I thought it would be but I like it.
customer_reviews.author: iPod lover

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Product took around 4 hours to assemble. I did most of it alone but would recommend putting it together with someone! Very sturdy and heavy once put together. Would recommend product! The back piece could be a little sturdier. Overall loving the wardrobe, using it to keep dress clothes in
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with the quality of this armoire
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with the quality of this armoire. It was relatively easy to assemble and the service was excellent. My husband broke one of the drawers putting it in but the company replaced it quickly and at no charge.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Siegrist

customer_reviews.title: Well-Engineered
customer_reviews.text: In the past have often been disappointed in "kit" furniture - even some of Suader's earlier items. But this one is exceptionally well-engineered - the fit was perfect and the instructions were straightforward. Ours was up and running in a matter of a few hours. Congratulations, Sauder!
customer_reviews.author: Tony H

customer_reviews.title: Helpful space
customer_reviews.text: For the cost, I was pleased with the armoire that I ordered from Amazon. The unusual color is what I noticed when ordering and I was very pleased with that. It was assembled by someone else besides myself and I was told that it was not easy! However, the drawers glide easily and stay level. The only small negative is that it has the cardboard backing, only on the upper part, but that would be handy if you were using this as an entertainment center with TV and electronics, etc. It is sturdy and heavy and I know that I will use it. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: CR

customer_reviews.title: ... it took hours to put it together because of poor directions. In the end I wish I had ...
customer_reviews.text: One the shelves was cracked and it took hours to put it together because of poor directions. In the end I wish I had not bought it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful piece. It was easier to put together than Ikea furniture and MUCH better quality. It looks much more expensive than it is. Solid and heavy wood. The color is perfect - very dark brown but not quite black.
customer_reviews.author: JILL HENDERSON

customer_reviews.title: 4 hours to put together with 2 people
customer_reviews.text: Took 4 hours to put together with 2 people, seems more solid for your typical DYI furniture. Only problem is bottom drawer, it will not go back all the way in unless you lift the top drawer (flipping the drawers was tried) seems like a theme since another Sauder Armoire did the same thing.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: I am so happy it's put together and I'm happy with my work
customer_reviews.text: Purchased and assembled completely by single female in her thirties. This is the first piece of furniture I've built, I took my time reading the directions and marking each item off. I am so happy it's put together and I'm happy with my work. If I had to do it over I would have looked longer for an armoire that was solid wood as apposed pressed board.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole F.

customer_reviews.title: but overall a good value for the price
customer_reviews.text: The veneer is VERY thin, but overall a good value for the price. A great solution for an older home with no closet in an upstairs bedroom, we were able to carry the parts upstairs, and assemble it in place. Most furniture would not fit up the stairs, so this worked out very well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice. It's very heavy. It scratches easily so be careful, that's the only issue I have with it so far. On the plus side it arrived a whole week early.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: Nice piece
customer_reviews.text: Nice Armoire for the money. Was very pleased with quality of product for the money
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: Wanted a little more white not so distressed. Good quality for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Diane T. Hadley

customer_reviews.title: 🤠🤠🤠🤠
customer_reviews.text: It nice but 5 hours to put together it big
customer_reviews.author: Jay R

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the price!
customer_reviews.text: We love it! We added it to our living room for storage. It matches our other furniture perfectly. Great value for the price!
customer_reviews.author: TwinMom

customer_reviews.title: don’t waste your money to get it
customer_reviews.text: This product is made by very cheap quality, don’t waste your money to get it.
customer_reviews.author: WENDY MIN FEI CHEN

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking big storage
customer_reviews.text: Predrilled holes that lined up made assembly go smoothly. Very heavy piece. Looks great and provides a lot of storage!
customer_reviews.author: deborah moore

customer_reviews.title: ... but all the parts were there and is relatively sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: Took several hours to assemble but all the parts were there and is relatively sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: lawrence

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice looking, but very difficult and time consuming to put together.
customer_reviews.author: weavertv

customer_reviews.title: Very good piece of furniture
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. Would like it to be about 3 inches wider but great nonetheless. Nice aesthetics also.
customer_reviews.author: ThatsMe

customer_reviews.title: Nice look
customer_reviews.text: Good solid armoire for extra storage, well made for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful piece of furniture. Very heavy furniture love the color.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price very heavy
customer_reviews.text: Looks great takes a few hours to build but had easy to follow guide.
customer_reviews.author: david

customer_reviews.title: Assembly
customer_reviews.text: It took us (2 guys) less than 3 hours to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas H. Ayers

customer_reviews.title: everyone loved it.
customer_reviews.text: purchased for a guest room that dose not have a closet, everyone loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described and what I was looking for! =)
customer_reviews.author: Lindy Hall

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great cabinet but it took time to put together, i like it!
customer_reviews.author: David Conrad

customer_reviews.title: Like the cabinet
customer_reviews.text: It was missing one piece and the joint on the trim wasn't finished but my dad was able to fix the trim and the piece that was missing was a decorative piece that went along the bottom. It wasn't a necessary piece. I really like the cabinet it looks great in my son's room. I am glad I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Sue Linn

customer_reviews.title: My new armoire.
customer_reviews.text: My armoire is perfect. The gentleman you sent to do the assembly did a great job. He was very pleasant and efficient. Thanks k you.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Looks great! Was easy to put together and exactly what I was looking for in our entryway area.
customer_reviews.author: KTD533

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Good for the price. Exactly what was needed for clothe storage. Looks very nice but difficult to assemble!
customer_reviews.author: dawn bruce

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It was hard to assemble but love the finished product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Takes a bit to put together but worth the time
customer_reviews.author: Fechague

customer_reviews.title: Great value and good looking piece
customer_reviews.text: Project turned out well. I would only recommend to someone who is somewhat handy with basic tools. Although it's only pressboard, it seems well constructed and sturdy. Great value for the money. Would recommend to friends who need extra storage.
customer_reviews.author: jerry wilk

customer_reviews.title: does the job
customer_reviews.text: it does the job. low quality material as expected. it was not too hard to assemble. if you take your time and are careful it should be good.
customer_reviews.author: FA

customer_reviews.title: Holes didn't match
customer_reviews.text: Parts didn't match, had to reorder new boards , but they were nice still waiting for it. It has been a week since I order it
customer_reviews.author: jose rivas

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice piece! It was difficult to put together but it was worthy
customer_reviews.author: wilmar larrota

customer_reviews.title: The perfect piece.
customer_reviews.text: My husband was very skeptical about ordering a particle board piece of furniture, but it is absolutely beautiful. It looks like solid wood. Very sturdy. With two people it took about an hour and a half to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Connie Dupuis

customer_reviews.title: Great armoire....do not hesitate
customer_reviews.text: It is the perfect fit for our beach house. Relatively easy (for my husband) to put together. Very well made, solid construction. Draws glide smoothly & cabinets close nicely. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Boucher

customer_reviews.title: Singlehandedly the worst piece of furniture I have ever bought
customer_reviews.text: This is not worth the money. Upon building this, the doors don't close, there was no pre-drilled hole for the latch, the drawers cannot close because the measurements of the armoire are incorrect and the doors are uneven. In addition, the drawer has snapped within one month and required emergency repair. The foot does not screw on properly either. Easily not worth the time or the money.
customer_reviews.author: Auger

customer_reviews.title: Love the style and color
customer_reviews.text: I love the color and the style but it's definitely not as solid as I would have liked. I bought the entire set and assembly took a while...8 hours+ for each item so definitely requires time and patience. The inside has a rod, no shelving. For me, I would have liked the option of a shelf.
customer_reviews.author: cchu

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Alittledifficult to put together, but once assembled, it met my expectation!
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Szymanski

customer_reviews.title: Nice piece of bedroom furniture, fills a niche...
customer_reviews.text: Very nice piece of furniture, quite heavy but does the job nicely. I did receive a couple pieces broken in shipment, but was resolved quickly and satisfactorily.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Neis

customer_reviews.title: Very nice. We tossed the cardboard back and bought a ...
customer_reviews.text: Very nice. We tossed the cardboard back and bought a piece of 1/4" plywood to cover the back. This gave it much needed stability and a 36"x48" piece off of the shelf worked out well. The seller was awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I had hired their assembler the trip was wasted. I will up date the review when replacement ...
customer_reviews.text: The thing came without directions, hardware, nobs,hinges, legs, top,drawer fronts. Clearly lacked elemental quality control. I had hired their assembler the trip was wasted. I will up date the review when replacement comes and see how helpful they are and amazon is.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I was disappointed in the finish of all the pieces in this ...
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed in the finish of all the pieces in this line. See my review of the mirror. However, the instructions were very good and it went together easily.
customer_reviews.author: Allie

customer_reviews.title: It's worth the low cost
customer_reviews.text: This looks great at first but doesn't last! It was horrible to put together there were over 40 pieces some were labeled some were not. The drawers were almost impossible to put in place and about 8 months in Both drawers stopped functioning properly and now won't close fully so it looks tacky. The price was great but I wish I'd paid more for a piece that would last.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: CHEAP
customer_reviews.text: Looks white in pic, says it's white wash, its cream! Cheap material. MANY pieces broke on me during assembly. In fact, I have to repair a drawer today. Very frustrated and unhappy customer. Would not recommend to anyone. Spend more and buy from real furniture store next time.
customer_reviews.author: kingmom4

customer_reviews.title: Armoire
customer_reviews.text: When we received this Armoire we were pleasantly Surprised, this item is sturdy and looks great. love it. it deserves a five star.
customer_reviews.author: Bruni

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this purchase and I was able to assemble ...
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this purchase and I was able to assemble it myself. Will purchase other products if the need arises.
customer_reviews.author: Karla O.

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy crap. The first slide out drawer broke the first ...
customer_reviews.text: Flimsy crap. The first slide out drawer broke the first week. What's up with furniture companies selling cheap garbage furniture but taking good money? What happen to solid wood?
customer_reviews.author: Live2Ride

customer_reviews.title: Returned Furniture
customer_reviews.text: I returned both items I ordered from Sauder Harbor. They did not provide me assistanceexcet for Nicole Perez at Home and Living. I don't know if they got the material because I could not get shipping information from them.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Smiley

product_meta.title: Sauder Harbor View Armoire, For TV's up to 32", Salt Oak finish
product_meta.description: Color:Salt Oak FinishNeed some extra storage in your life? Check out this armoire from the Harbor View collection. Behind its louver detailed doors, it features a garment hanging rod and storage cubbyholes for your abundance of button ups and high heels. Switch it up and use it as a TV stand that accommodates up to a 32" TV. Two spacious drawers hold more clothing, blankets, or movies and games. Detailed with turned feet and finished in Salt Oak, this armoire is the perfect solution for your obsession of clothes and electronics.
feature_bullets: Safety tested for stability to help reduce tip-over accidents
Garment hanging rod for hanging clothes – keep the wrinkles away
Storage cubbyholes behind louver detailed doors which fold back against end panels
Holds up to a 32" TV weighing 95 lbs. or less for optimal viewing pleasure
Two drawers with metal runners and safety stops to keep you and your family safe

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars121 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
